verses.name: Genesis 31:27
verses.text: Wherefore didst thou flee away secretly, and steal away from me; and didst not tell me, that I might have sent thee away with mirth, and with songs, with tabret, and with harp?

verses.name: Genesis 31:28
verses.text: And hast not suffered me to kiss my sons and my daughters? thou hast now done foolishly in so doing.

verses.name: Genesis 31:29
verses.text: It is in the power of my hand to do you hurt: but the God of your father spake unto me yesternight, saying, Take thou heed that thou speak not to Jacob either good or bad.
